skills.name: Install Headless UI
skills.pattern: npm install @headlessui/react

skills.name: Vue Install
skills.pattern: npm install @headlessui/vue

skills.name: Unstyled
skills.pattern: Headless UI provides behavior only - you style with Tailwind or custom CSS

skills.name: Accessible
skills.pattern: Full keyboard navigation, focus management, ARIA attributes

skills.name: Menu
skills.pattern:
import { Menu } from '@headlessui/react';
<Menu>
  <Menu.Button>Options</Menu.Button>
  <Menu.Items>
    <Menu.Item>{({ active }) => <button className={active ? 'bg-blue-500' : ''}>Edit</button>}</Menu.Item>
  </Menu.Items>
</Menu>

skills.name: Menu Transition
skills.pattern:
<Transition as={Fragment} enter='transition ease-out' enterFrom='opacity-0' enterTo='opacity-100'>
  <Menu.Items>...</Menu.Items>
</Transition>

skills.name: Listbox
skills.pattern:
import { Listbox } from '@headlessui/react';
<Listbox value={selected} onChange={setSelected}>
  <Listbox.Button>{selected.name}</Listbox.Button>
  <Listbox.Options>
    {options.map(o => <Listbox.Option key={o.id} value={o}>{o.name}</Listbox.Option>)}
  </Listbox.Options>
</Listbox>

skills.name: Listbox Multiple
skills.pattern:
<Listbox value={selected} onChange={setSelected} multiple>
  {/* Options can be selected multiple */}
</Listbox>

skills.name: Combobox
skills.pattern:
import { Combobox } from '@headlessui/react';
<Combobox value={selected} onChange={setSelected}>
  <Combobox.Input onChange={(e) => setQuery(e.target.value)} />
  <Combobox.Options>
    {filtered.map(p => <Combobox.Option key={p.id} value={p}>{p.name}</Combobox.Option>)}
  </Combobox.Options>
</Combobox>

skills.name: Switch
skills.pattern:
import { Switch } from '@headlessui/react';
<Switch checked={enabled} onChange={setEnabled} className={`${enabled ? 'bg-blue-600' : 'bg-gray-200'} relative inline-flex h-6 w-11 items-center rounded-full`}>
  <span className={`${enabled ? 'translate-x-6' : 'translate-x-1'} inline-block h-4 w-4 transform bg-white rounded-full`} />
</Switch>

skills.name: Switch Label
skills.pattern:
<Switch.Group>
  <Switch.Label>Enable notifications</Switch.Label>
  <Switch checked={enabled} onChange={setEnabled}>...</Switch>
</Switch.Group>

skills.name: Disclosure
skills.pattern:
import { Disclosure } from '@headlessui/react';
<Disclosure>
  <Disclosure.Button>Show more</Disclosure.Button>
  <Disclosure.Panel>Hidden content</Disclosure.Panel>
</Disclosure>

skills.name: Disclosure State
skills.pattern:
<Disclosure>
  {({ open }) => (
    <>
      <Disclosure.Button>{open ? 'Close' : 'Open'}</Disclosure.Button>
      <Disclosure.Panel>Content</Disclosure.Panel>
    </>
  )}
</Disclosure>

skills.name: Dialog
skills.pattern:
import { Dialog } from '@headlessui/react';
<Dialog open={isOpen} onClose={() => setIsOpen(false)}>
  <Dialog.Panel>
    <Dialog.Title>Title</Dialog.Title>
    <Dialog.Description>Description</Dialog.Description>
    <button onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}>Close</button>
  </Dialog.Panel>
</Dialog>

skills.name: Dialog Backdrop
skills.pattern:
setIsOpen(false)}>
...

skills.name: Popover
skills.pattern: import { Popover } from '@headlessui/react'; Solutions Analytics

skills.name: Popover Group
skills.pattern:
<Popover.Group>
  <Popover>...</Popover>
  <Popover>...</Popover>
</Popover.Group>

skills.name: RadioGroup
RadioGroup Styling
skills.pattern: {({ checked }) => {plan}}

skills.name: Tab
skills.pattern:
import { Tab } from '@headlessui/react';
<Tab.Group>
  <Tab.List>
    <Tab>Tab 1</Tab>
    <Tab>Tab 2</Tab>
  </Tab.List>
  <Tab.Panels>
    <Tab.Panel>Content 1</Tab.Panel>
    <Tab.Panel>Content 2</Tab.Panel>
  </Tab.Panels>
</Tab.Group>

skills.name: Tab Styling
skills.pattern:
<Tab className={({ selected }) => selected ? 'bg-white' : 'text-blue-100'}>
  Tab
</Tab>

skills.name: Transition
skills.pattern:
import { Transition } from '@headlessui/react';
Content

skills.name: Transition Child
skills.pattern:
<Transition show={isOpen}>
  <Transition.Child enter='ease-out' enterFrom='opacity-0'>Backdrop</Transition.Child>
  <Transition.Child enter='ease-out' enterFrom='opacity-0 scale-95'>Panel</Transition.Child>
</Transition>

skills.name: Render Props
skills.pattern: <Menu.Item>{({ active, disabled }) => <button className={active ? 'active' : ''}>Item</button>}</Menu.Item>

skills.name: as Prop
skills.pattern:
<Menu.Button as={Fragment}>...</Menu.Button>
<Dialog.Panel as='form'>...</Dialog.Panel>

skills.name: Focus Management
skills.pattern: Dialog automatically traps focus and returns focus on close

skills.name: Keyboard Navigation
skills.pattern: Menu, Listbox, Combobox support arrow keys, Enter, Escape, Tab

skills.name: Portal
skills.pattern: Dialog and Popover render to document.body by default for proper stacking

skills.name: static Prop
skills.pattern: <Disclosure.Panel static>{/* Always in DOM, visibility controlled by CSS */}</Disclosure.Panel>

skills.name: unmount Prop
skills.pattern: <Disclosure.Panel unmount={false}>{/* Hidden but stays in DOM */}</Disclosure.Panel>
